title: They tried keeping schools open but now even Singapore has announced a month-long shutdown
description: Singapore will close schools and most workplaces for a month, more than 1 million cases of COVID-19 are confirmed worldwide, and Spain and the UK experience their deadliest days.
content:
Updated 
April 03, 2020 20:44:13
Singapore has announced it will shut down schools and most workplaces for a month, more than 1 million cases of COVID-19 have now been confirmed worldwide and Australian places of worship will be considered workplaces so the… [+24285 chars]
